welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Burgess Hill, where quaint countryside charm meets modern city living! Get ready to discover our beautiful parks, lively markets, and rich history. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories in our lovely town."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Shoreham Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Gatwick Airport is a modern and spacious terminal that handles both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the busier of the two terminals, handling a large number of international flights and serving as a hub for several airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a time limit of 90 minutes per device.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Biggin Hill Airport caters to private and executive flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
